Room.Name: Bendine Aquarium Main Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Main Hallway, exploring the wonders of the Bendine Aquarium.
Room.LongDescription: The hallway continues to the east and west. To the west, you can see the giant Fresh Water Aquarium where all kinds of wierd and strange creatures live. To the north, you can see the room where the octopi are kept. The Octopus Tank can hold a number of octopi, which are inherently dangerous. Caution should be exercised when entering this tank.
